death_place.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学附设医院

description.zh-cn: 台湾人权律师与政治人物，民主进步党创党元老及首任党主席，曾任中华民国立法委员、监察委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese human rights lawyer and politician, a founding member and the first chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, who served as a member of the Legislative Yuan and Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，由党外运动人士于1986年创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China (Taiwan), founded in 1986 by Tangwai movement activists.

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月10日于台湾高雄市发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，事件后中华民国政府对多名民主人士进行逮捕与审判。
description.en: A major police-citizen conflict that occurred in Kaohsiung, Taiwan on December 10, 1979. After the incident, the Republic of China government arrested and tried numerous democracy activists.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，美丽岛事件受刑人之一，曾任民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, one of the defendants in the Kaohsiung Incident, and former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 指1978年至1988年间由蒋经国担任总统的中华民国政府。
description.en: Refers to the government of the Republic of China under President Chiang Ching-kuo from 1978 to 1988.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席，后指控江鹏坚为调查局卧底。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, who later accused Chiang Peng-chien of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党创党党员之一，曾与江鹏坚角逐台北市长提名，后为其辩护。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, one of the founding members of the Democratic Progressive Party, who competed with Chiang Peng-chien for the Taipei mayoral nomination and later defended him.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。曾与江鹏坚角逐台北市长提名，后于江鹏坚逝世后颁赠褒扬令。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China. He competed with Chiang Peng-chien for the Taipei mayoral nomination and later issued a posthumous citation for him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest supervisory organ of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾与江鹏坚竞争民主进步党首届党主席职位。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who competed with Chiang Peng-chien for the first chairmanship of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，于江鹏坚担任民进党主席期间任秘书长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as Secretary-General of the Democratic Progressive Party during Chiang Peng-chien's chairmanship.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的综合性研究型公立大学。
description.en: A national public research university in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 由江鹏坚创立的台湾人权组织。
description.en: A human rights organization in Taiwan founded by Chiang Peng-chien.

description.zh-cn: 施明德的兄长。
description.en: The elder brother of Shih Ming-teh.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前民进党籍立法委员，宣称看过江鹏坚持有的情搜文件。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former DPP legislator who claimed to have seen intelligence documents held by Chiang Peng-chien.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚的遗孀。
description.en: The widow of Chiang Peng-chien.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚之父。
description.en: Father of Chiang Peng-chien.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚之母。
description.en: Mother of Chiang Peng-chien.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任监察院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、外交官，曾任监察院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and diplomat who served as President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚是江火财的儿子。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien is the son of Chiang Huo-tsai.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚是陈惜的儿子。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien is the son of Chen Hsi.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚与江彭丰美为夫妻关系。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien and Chiang Peng Feng-mei were married.

degree.zh-cn: 法律学系学士、法律研究所硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Laws, Master of Laws

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚于1984年创立了台湾人权促进会。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien founded the Taiwan Association for Human Rights in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚在美丽岛事件中担任被告林义雄的辩护律师，此举加深了他对党外运动的参与。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien served as the defense lawyer for defendant Lin I-hsiung in the Kaohsiung Incident, which deepened his involvement in the Tangwai movement.

description.zh-cn: 在军事法庭审判中，江鹏坚为美丽岛事件被告之一的林义雄辩护。
description.en: In the military court trial, Chiang Peng-chien defended Lin I-hsiung, one of the defendants of the Kaohsiung Incident.

description.zh-cn: 美丽岛事件发生后，蒋经国政府逮捕了许多参与者。
description.en: After the Kaohsiung Incident, the Chiang Ching-kuo government arrested many participants.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚是民主进步党创党十人小组之一，并协同其他党外人士筹组该党。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien was one of the ten-member group that founded the Democratic Progressive Party and organized the party with other Tangwai activists.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚于1986年至1987年担任民进党首任党主席，并于1992年至1993年担任秘书长。
description.en: Chiang Peng-chien served as the first chairman of the DPP from 1986 to 1987, and as Secretary-General from 1992 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 在民进党首届党主席选举中以一票之差击败费希平。
description.en: Defeated Fei Hsi-ping by one vote in the election for the first DPP chairman.

description.zh-cn: 于江鹏坚担任民进党主席期间，担任秘书长。
description.en: Served as Secretary-General while Chiang Peng-chien was the DPP Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 于许信良担任民进党主席期间，担任秘书长。
description.en: Served as Secretary-General while Hsu Hsin-liang was the DPP Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚担任监察委员期间，王作荣为监察院院长。
description.en: While Chiang Peng-chien was a member of the Control Yuan, Wang Tso-jung was its President.

description.zh-cn: 江鹏坚担任监察委员期间，钱复为监察院院长。
description.en: While Chiang Peng-chien was a member of the Control Yuan, Fredrick Chien was its President.

description.zh-cn: 1994年共同角逐民进党台北市长候选人提名。
description.en: Competed for the DPP's Taipei mayoral nomination in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 1994年共同角逐民进党台北市长候选人提名。
description.en: Competed for the DPP's Taipei mayoral nomination in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 以时任中华民国总统身份，于江鹏坚逝世后颁赠褒扬令。
description.en: As the incumbent President of the Republic of China, issued a posthumous citation after Chiang Peng-chien's death.

description.zh-cn: 公开宣称江鹏坚曾向他承认是调查局训练班出身，并负责监视其兄施明正，对其声誉造成负面影响。
description.en: Publicly claimed that Chiang Peng-chien had admitted to him that he was a trainee of the Investigation Bureau and was responsible for monitoring his brother Shih Ming-cheng, which negatively affected his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 宣称看过江鹏坚持有的情搜文件，支持施明德的指控。
description.en: Claimed to have seen intelligence documents held by Chiang Peng-chien, supporting Shih Ming-teh's accusation.

description.zh-cn: 根据施明德的指控，江鹏坚曾负责监视施明正。
description.en: According to Shih Ming-teh's accusation, Chiang Peng-chien was responsible for monitoring Shih Ming-cheng.

description.zh-cn: 在施明德指控江鹏坚为调查局卧底后，谢长廷发文为江鹏坚辩护。
description.en: After Shih Ming-teh accused Chiang Peng-chien of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau, Frank Hsieh posted to defend Chiang.

description.zh-cn: 作为江鹏坚的遗孀，否认并驳斥施明德的指控。
description.en: As Chiang Peng-chien's widow, she denied and refuted Shih Ming-teh's accusations.
